heading: HB06569
0: AN ACT RENAMING THE ZIGA MEMORIAL DISTRICT HOSPITAL IN THE CITY OF TABACO AS THE DR. LORENZO P. ZIGA MEMORIAL DISTRICT HOSPITAL, CONVERTING IT TO AN EXTENSION HOSPITAL OF THE BICOL REGIONAL TRAINING AND TEACHING HOSPITAL, INCREASING ITS BED CAPACITY TO ONE HUNDRED FIFTY (150) BEDS, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
